page.title: 02INTRODUCTION (2)
page.content: Near {ST. ANDREWS }there is{ a{METHODIST CHURCH. We found out about a few factories in the area ;{LLOYD MAUNDERS}was the largest. { LLOYD MAUNDERS}This is an abbatoir. They have 750 staff and they receive the animals on the hoof.Then they slaughter them and pack the meat up and send it away using their own transport. Not far from the abbatoir there is the{M5 MOTORWAY}and the{LONDON-EXETER {RAILWAY}.Three miles north is the {NORTH DEVON LINK ROAD}which makes traffic a lot less busy in Halberton.In the north of the area there is a canal which starts at Tiverton and ends at Lowdwells.North of the canal seems hilly and south seems rather flat.
